resources.string: Take a photo with the Camera"
Welcome to Beeld van Den Haag
Here you can send your message to the screen on the Haagse Toren.

Welcome to the app of Beeld van Den Haag.


In this app you can easily send a message with or without picture to the Haagse Toren, always and everywhere.


There are no charges made for this (excluding the costs of using mobile internet).
 After your entry has been approved you will receive an email notification. A few minutes after this your message will appear in the block "Beeld van Den Haag" on the Haagse Toren.


Beeld van Den Haag is an initiative of Ngage Media. Every entry will be moderated. Ngage Media reserves the right to dismiss a message without notifying the user. For commercial enquiries you can contact sales@ngagemedia.nl.
What would you like to display on the Den Haag tower?
The message must have a max of 4 lines.
The message is displayed in the same way on the Den Haag Tower.
Satisfied? Then check out the preview!
I declare that I own all rights to the uploaded image.
Please fill in your email address
Please tick the check box if youve agreed with the terms
You will receive an email when your message has been approved! Your Message will soon be displayed on the screen of Den Haag
No internet connection was found. Please check your internet connection and try again.
